body.name: Cutluxe Cleaver Chef Knife – 8" Meat Cleaver Butcher Knife – German Steel Blade, Full Tang, Ergonomic Handle Design – Artisan Series
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: A Kitchen Essential - Designed with special grooves on the sides, our premium multipurpose knife allows for easier chopping, slicing, cutting, dicing, and mincing of meat, poultry, and vegetables.

Razor Sharp Edge - Made with German quality stainless high carbon steel, the blade of this chopping knife was hand-sharpened at 14-16 degrees on each side for superior sharpness and maximum edge retention.
Tough & Durable - With a hardness of 56+ on the Rockwell scale, our santoku kitchen knives boast superb resilience against rusting and staining. It's designed to withstand daily use in the kitchen.
Designed For Ease of Use - This stainless steel knife has an ergonomic pakkawood handle that is triple-riveted to give you a firm, secure, and comfortable grip that allows for better maneuverability.
A Cut Above The Rest - Our full tang kitchen knives are designed to last a lifetime. As such, we're backing them with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects so you can buy with confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife, great value
reviews.reviewText: First off - this is a beefy knife! Heavy and solid. Very sharp. Balanced with a comfortable handle. My wife loves using it. 100% recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So, I bought this knife because it looked good and had good reviews. First, let me say, it is packaged extremely well. Comes in it’s own box and with a special cloth to clean after washing before putting away.This knife is sturdy to hold and easily maneuvered to cut as well as chop. The grip is perfect for my hand and does not slip. The weight of the blade is balanced perfectly.It impressed me so much, I bought 2 more as gifts to my adult children. My Son called me to say it cuts thru bone even. He didn’t mean to go that far, but it cut thru the meat so easily. My daughter has not given me her feed back as yet, but I’m sure it’s positive. The 2 of us already love ours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I 've been using 2 high-end cutlery sets daily for the last 30 years, Zwilling Twin Cuisine and Wüstof Ikon. But I never got a cleaver. I decided to finally get one so I researched all the option out there but wanted to start off with something less expensive at first to see if a cleaver was right for me, and if so what size and weight. So after extensive review reading I decided to try this Cutluxe 7". This is an exceptionally well made product easily on par with the rest of my Wüstoff and Zwilling collection. The handle is superbly crafted into tang and a perfect size. The blade came razor sharp out of the box and makes quick work of whole chicken and Turkey but I have fallen in love with it for vegetable chop. Just awesome. Frankly I am shocked this cleaver sells for under 50 bux. Well worth $200. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife and chopper combo.
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my wife to clean fish, she wanted a knife that will fillet and break their bones, thisdoes the trick. My wife is one of those who uses one knife for everything and we go throughknives like it's cool, this has good grip and not heavy at all, you can fillet, slice, and chop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy I bought
reviews.reviewText: Looks to be a well built and long-lasting piece of cutlery. Like all items like this only time will tell. It looks good enough to outlast me. So, no complaints with purchase. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best knife ever
reviews.reviewText: Extremely sharp. cuts through everything with ease. I plan to purchase more knives and accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Surprised at the quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Por el precio, recibí un cuchillo de muy buena calidad y excelente apariencia. Viene en su estuche junto con varios detallitos en su interior propios de un cuchillo de un rango mayor de precio. Se nota que la marca le está echando ganas para posicionarse. Compré el cuchillo híbrido, y hay pocas opciones en Amazon de este tipo de cuchillos por lo regular de un costo mucho más elevado. El peso y el balance del cuchillo me parece adecuado, tirando ligeramente hacia pesado, pero es lo que se espera para este tipo de cuchillos. Los acabados son muy buenos para el rango de precio se notan de calidad tanto el metal como el mango (que poniéndose exigente, pudiera estar mejor pulido). En general es un buen producto y estoy muy satisfecho con la compra.
Ein sehr gutes Produkt. Super Scharf

reviews.reviewTitle: Cadeau de Noël livré dans coffret
reviews.reviewText: Pas encore testé mais je me fie aux avis notamment du boucher à la retraite. Aspect qualitatif envoi rapide et soigné
scusa la mannaia che avevo prima , aveva la lama rotta a metà ed il manico rotto legato con il filo di ferroovviamente è partito di corsa per la rottamazione.adesso questa mannaia è una meraviglia
Se ha roto por el medio al cortar un pollo. Se ha astillado y se ha soltado un trozo del filo. Prácticamente inservible después de eso.
